Text:
English:  Any DVD Converter for Mac is an all-in-one Mac DVD ripper and video converter for Mac as a Mac DVD ripper and Mac video converter that lets you rip DVD and convert video files to popular video formats includng AVI, MP4, 3GP, FLV, SWF, MPEG-1, MPEG-2 and audio formats like MP3, AAC, OGG and Wave. With this Mac DVD ripper and Mac video converter, you can easily rip DVD and convert video on Mac to the portable media player, including iPod, iPhone, PSP, Sony Walkman, Sansa View and mobile phones such as BlackBerry, Gphone and Nokia N-series.

Features of Any DVD Converter for Mac

* Super fast conversion speed from one format to almost all video to iPod, PSP, DV, DVD, Tivo, AVI, MP4, WMV, MPEG and Flash.
- Multithreading and batch conversion are supported. The conversion speed is unlimited and will be improved with better performance of your Mac;

* Diverse preset profiles to fit various devices
- There are several optimized profiles for PSP, PS3, iPod, iPhone, Apple TV, Zune, Archos, iRiver PMP, Creative Zen, BlackBerry mobile phone etc with different quality in the software that can be used directly without any configuration .

* Provide advanced settings for output
- In addition to the default settings, the experienced user can set the advanced settings, such as video size, bit rate, frame rate, etc.
Convert any file in three steps. Click, drag, click.

- Almost all popular video and audio formats are supported like AVI, MPEG, MP4, ASF, MOV, WMV, MP3, AAC, M4A, etc.

* Batch processing multiple files. Save on the spot, or in a different folder.
* Dynamic Preview - See results before beginning a long encode.
* Files stitch to combine multiple videos.
